review: this property is located in the market . the place is noisy till 9pm .rooms are too small without cupboard. walls without hangers having odour of dampness inspite of room freshner spray . If you are not getting shelter any where only in that case book this property.
name: TripHoJaye

review: I booked the hotel through a travel portal and no room pics were given on it. The hotel is located hardly 50 m off the main sadar bazar market square. It does not have any restaurant attached but there are some in the market, but you cannot get room service. The rooms were clean and tidy but very very small with absolutely no moving space. We had lot of discomfort with opening our luggage. The bathroom was also small and did not have a shower.
name: Roamer077
